original_text: Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
korean_text: 너희는 이 세대를 본받지 말고 오직 마음을 새롭게 함으로 변화를 받아 하나님의 선하시고 기뻐하시고 온전하신 뜻이 무엇인지 분별하도록 하라

sentences.original_text: Do not be conformed to this world
but be transformed by the renewal of your mind
that by testing you may discern
what is the will of God
what is good and acceptable and perfect
